page.title: 14Vandalism
page.content:
{Vandalism}is on the increase.Phone boxes,bus shelters and walls of any kind are defaced.{Vandalism}takes the form of graffiti,smash glass and destruction of public property.The age group of the {vandals}would seem to be between 10 and 18.Policing is scarce in {Normanby}and{Eston}area and we feel there should be more policing,at {Normanby}there is a bus stop covered in white paint,black felt tip pen and most of the glass is smashed.Nothing has been done about it.
Although we think there is a problem in our area,bigger towns have bigger problems.
